item.title: Degrading Crystal Bow, Help?
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

Would anyone know where I would add this degrading Crystal Bow at in client.java? But could you tell me where to put it in client.java?

if(CbowHP > 0)
CbowHP -= 1;

public void setEquipment(int wearID, int amount, int targetSlot) {
public int CbowHP = 1000;

public void cBowProcess(){
if (CbowHP == 1000 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4214)){
CbowHP -= hitDiff * 2;
}
else if (CbowHP == 900 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4214)){
deleteequiment(4214, playerWeapon);
addItem(4215, 1);
CbowHP -= hitDiff * 2;
sendMessage(“Your Crystal bow has lost some power, check your inventory!”);
}
else if (CbowHP == 800 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4215)){
deleteequiment(4215, playerWeapon);
addItem(4216, 1);
CbowHP -= hitDiff * 2;
sendMessage(“Your Crystal bow has lost some power, check your inventory!”);
}
else if (CbowHP == 700 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4216)){
deleteequiment(4216, playerWeapon);
addItem(4217, 1);
CbowHP -= hitDiff * 2;
sendMessage(“Your Crystal bow has lost some power, check your inventory!”);
}
else if (CbowHP == 600 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4217)){
deleteequiment(4217, playerWeapon);
addItem(4218, 1);
CbowHP -= hitDiff * 2;
sendMessage(“Your Crystal bow has lost some power, check your inventory!”);
}
else if (CbowHP == 500 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4218)){
deleteequiment(4218, playerWeapon);
addItem(4219, 1);
CbowHP -= hitDiff * 2;
sendMessage(“Your Crystal bow has lost some power, check your inventory!”);
}
else if (CbowHP == 400 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4219)){
deleteequiment(4219, playerWeapon);
addItem(4220, 1);
CbowHP -= hitDiff * 2;
sendMessage(“Your Crystal bow has lost some power, check your inventory!”);
}
else if (CbowHP == 300 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4220)){
deleteequiment(4220, playerWeapon);
addItem(4221, 1);
CbowHP -= hitDiff * 2;
sendMessage(“Your Crystal bow has lost some power, check your inventory!”);
}
else if (CbowHP == 200 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4221)){
deleteequiment(4221, playerWeapon);
addItem(4222, 1);
CbowHP -= hitDiff * 2;
sendMessage(“Your Crystal bow has lost some power, check your inventory!”);
}
else if (CbowHP == 100 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4222)){
deleteequiment(4222, playerWeapon);
addItem(4223, 1);
CbowHP -= hitDiff * 2;
sendMessage(“Your Crystal bow has lost some power, check your inventory!”);
}
else if (CbowHP == 0 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4223)){
deleteequiment(4223, playerWeapon);
addItem(4207, 1);
CbowHP -= hitDiff * 2;
sendMessage(“Your Crystal bow has broke! Check your inventory!”);
}
}
